name: sick-motion
title: Sick Motion
description: Control a macOS motion dots overlay from Raycast.
author: achilleas_drakou

commands.name: toggle-motion-dots
commands.title: Toggle Motion Dots
commands.description: Toggle the motion dots overlay on/off

commands.name: enable-motion-dots
commands.title: Enable Motion Dots
commands.description: Turn on the motion dots overlay

commands.name: disable-motion-dots
commands.title: Disable Motion Dots
commands.description: Turn off the motion dots overlay

preferences.name: sickMotionCtlPath
preferences.title: sickmotionctl Path
preferences.description: Optional full path to the sickmotionctl binary.
